DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess relevance NRI athletes ' NRI ( ANRI ) utilization detect nutrition-related risk failure competition particular population rower . In morning , 60 90 minute first race national level multi-races competition ( three race subject ) , body weight measure blood sample collect subject rest post-absorptive condition ( last meal least 2.5 hour blood collection ) . Body weight also record condition six week competition calculate weight state ( actual weight /usual weight Â´ 100 ) subject ask identify date diet beginning . Body weight measure use floor scale ( Mettler-Toledo floor scale , France ) , body mass index ( BMI ) calculate ratio weight ( kg ) height square ( meter ) training volume ( total duration train week ) determine discussion athlete coach .
